thread.title: Iran to face "the sting of sanctions": Pompeo

title: Iran to face "the sting of sanctions": Pompeo
text:
Iran to face "the sting of sanctions": Pompeo 9:04pm IST - 02:04
U.S. Secretary of State Mike Pompeo said on Monday the United States would impose the ''strongest sanctions in history'' against the Iranian leadership, after Washington pulled out of the 2015 nuclear deal.. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
U.S. Secretary of State Mike Pompeo said on Monday the United States would impose the "strongest sanctions in history" against the Iranian leadership, after Washington pulled out of the 2015 nuclear deal..
